article:
The '1988–89 Football League Cup' was the twenty-ninth season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football clubs.
The competition started on the 29th August 1988 and ended with the final on 9
April 1989.

The final was contested by First Division teams Nottingham Forest and Luton Town
at Wembley Stadium in London.
